metadata.title: CVE-2023-6725 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An access-control flaw was found in the OpenStack Designate component whereprivate configuration information including access keys to BIND wereimproperly made world readable. A malicious attacker with access to anycontainer could exploit this flaw to access sensitive information.

criterions.comment: designate package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-03-18').
